channel.title: Compile help
channel.description:
i made my own server a long time ago then zipped it and put it on a cd. now i uploaded it and and it ran perfectly until i deleted the old characters to make space. then i tryed to compile it using my new java (1.6.0_11) and it wouldnt work then i tryed to run the server and it wouldnt work cuz it wasnt compiled.
then i try uploading the server again and had the same problem except i didnt delete anything on this one and tryed to run it and it wouldnt work. what did i do.?

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

do i put jre instead of jdk.?

cuz i already put it in.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @Noobiex Noobiex
item.description:
@Noobiex wrote:

I_AM_LEGEND:

so do i download the JRE.?

Ok Matthew, if you haven’t fixed it already what you need to do is…

This is the Path for Vista, i’m not sure about Windows XP’s Path.

Control Panel\System

Then you need to go to “Environment Variables”

Then add your Java Path in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

did you also install it or did you just download it?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

alright i did and ur compiler says i didnt download jdk.

i feel retarded :
or maybe my computer is.

Read full topic

yes, download the same version of JRE of your JDK

looks like this will help but i downloaded this java then uninstalled and downloaded it again.

do u think it has anything to do with the fact that my computer is windows xp.?

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished ! pause exit

replace it with that ^

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

im matthew by the way.

[code]@echo off

:def
color 04

:main
cls
title matthew’s Great compiler
echo/////XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////X
echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////X
echo/////XXXXXXXXXXXXXX[Welcome to matthew’s Great compiler].XXXXXXXX
echo/////X
echo/////X Type run to run your server.
echo/////X Type COM TO COMPILE YOUR SERVER.
echo/////X Type AUTO TO RUN YOUR SERVER WITH AUTORESTART
echo/////X Type BACK TO BACK UP YOUR SERVER FILES
echo/////X Type CRD TO VIEW MY CREDITS
echo/////X TYPE COMM TO MAKE COMMANDS
echo/////X
echo/////XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////X
echo/////XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
echo/////X
echo/////X
echo/////X
echo/////XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////X
echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////X
echo/////XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
set /p mainc=////X Choice:

if %mainc%==com goto com
if %mainc%==run goto run
if %mainc%==auto goto auto
if %mainc%==back goto back

if %mainc%==comm goto comm
if %mainc%==crd goto crd

if %mainc%==COM goto com
if %mainc%==RUN goto run
if %mainc%==AUTO goto auto
if %mainc%==BACK goto back

if %mainc%==COMM goto comm
if %mainc%==CRD goto crd

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling…
echo :: Preparing for compile…
echo :: Auto-setting envriomental variables…
echo ::
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo :: Finding latest java…
echo ::
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_15\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_14\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_13\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM05
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_15
SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: Finished
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_14
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: Finished
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_13
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: Finished
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: Finished
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo :: Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;
echo :: Results:
javac *.java
echo :: Finished
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo :: No version of JDK 1.6 was detected.
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo :: Port:
echo :: 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_15\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_14\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_13\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN05
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_15…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_15\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN04
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_14…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN03
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_13…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN02
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed!
pause
goto main
:RUN01
echo :: Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo :: Failed! Need JDK 1.6.0_xx
pause
cls
goto main

:back
:backup
cls
title Backing up files…
echo :: Backing up files…
if not exist Backup mkdir Backup
if not exist Backup\characters mkdir Backup\characters
if not exist Backup\connectedFrom mkdir Backup\connectedFrom
if not exist Backup\data mkdir Backup\data
if not exist Backup\flagged mkdir Backup\flagged
if not exist Backup\logs mkdir Backup\logs
if not exist Backup\moreinfo mkdir Backup\moreinfo
if not exist Backup\savedGames mkdir Backup\savedGames
Echo Starting Backup Copy
copy /V /Y /A *.txt .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.java .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.class .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.cfg .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A *.bat .\Backup
copy /V /Y /A bans .\Backup\bans
copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters
copy /V /Y /A characters .\Backup\characters
copy /V /Y /A connectedFrom .\Backup\connectedFrom
copy /V /Y /A data .\Backup\data
copy /V /Y /A flagged .\Backup\flagged
copy /V /Y /A logs .\Backup\logs
copy /V /Y /A moreinfo .\Backup\moreinfo
copy /V /Y /A savedGames .\Backup\savedGames
echo :: Finished
pause
cls
goto main

goto main

:loc
cls
echo :: Below is a list of locations with their coordinates.
echo ::
echo :: Varrock - 3210 3424
echo :: Falador - 2964 3378
echo :: Lumbridge - 3222 3218
echo :: Camelot - 2757 3477
echo :: East Ardougne 2662 3305
echo :: West Ardougne 2529 3307
echo :: Al Kharid 3293 3174
echo :: Khalphite Lair 3226 3107
echo :: Yannille 2606 3093
echo :: Tutorial Island 3094 3107
echo :: Barbarian Village 3082 3420
echo :: Entrana 2834 3335
echo :: Heroes Guild 2902 3510
echo :: Rangers Guild 2658 3439
echo :: Catherby 2813 3447
echo :: Seers Village 2708 3492
echo :: Fishing Guild 2603 3414
echo :: Isafdar 2241 3238
pause
cls

goto main

cls
goto main

:comm
:Star
Set /p CommName=Command Input?
Set /p RUSure=Is that gonna be your command: %CmdName%(yes,no)?
If %RUSure%==no GOTO Star
If not Exist CommandsFolder MD Commands Folder
Echo else if(command.equalsignorecase("%CmdName%")) >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo { >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
cls
set /p AY=addItem(yes,no)?
If %AY%==YES Goto set item
If %AY%==yes Goto set item
If %AY%==no Goto endCode
If %AY%==NO Goto endCode
:addItem
cls
set /p ID=ItemID?
cls
set /p Amount=Amount Of that Item?
cls
echo addItem(%ID%,%Amount%); >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=Add item, add tele or finish command.(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode
if %type%==* goto error
echo.
goto error
:error
cls
echo Commands invalid. Only use commands from the menu.
pause
goto menu
:endCode
cls
Echo } >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /p Again=Make Another (yes, No)?
If %Again%==yes GOTO Star
If %Again%==no goto fin
If %Again%==YES GOTO Star
If %Again%==NO goto fin
:Tele
cls
Set /P X=XCoord Tele?
Set /P Y=YCoord Tele?
Echo teleportToX = %X% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Echo teleportToY = %Y% >> “.\Commands%CmdName% Command.txt”
Set /P AT=addItem Or Another Tele(not Used In Same Command Usually(AI,T,End)
If %AT%==ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==Ai GOTO addItem
If %AT%==AI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==aI GOTO addItem
If %AT%==T GOTO Tele
If %AT%==t GOTO Tele
If %AT%==end GOTO endCode
If %AT%==END GOTO endCode
If %AT%==EnD GOTO endCode
If %AT%==eNd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==ENd GOTO endCode
If %AT%==enD GOTO endCode
if %AT%==End Goto endcode

:fin
echo Command creation complete. Find it in the commands folder.
pause
cls
goto main

:auto
cls
echo :: Have you already set up your autorestarter? (Y/N)

set /p ans=:: Answer:

if %ans%==y goto ansyes
if %ans%==n goto ansno
goto main

:ansyes
cls
call autorestart.bat
echo Not Found!
pause
goto main

:ansno
cls
echo :: How long between auto restarts?
set /p hlb=:: (10min, 12min, 14min, 16min, 18min, 20min):

if %hlb%==10min goto min10
if %hlb%==12min goto min12
if %hlb%==14min goto min14
if %hlb%==16min goto min16
if %hlb%==18min goto min18
if %hlb%==20min goto min20

:min10
del ProcessKiller.bat
del Autorestart.bat
del Runner.bat

echo :start >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 600000 >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo tskill java >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo start call runner >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo goto start >> ProcessKiller.bat

echo java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server >> Runner.bat
echo exit >> Runner.bat

echo @echo off >> Autorestart.bat
echo :start >> Autorestart.bat
echo Start call “Runner.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo call “ProcessKiller.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo pause >> Autorestart.bat
echo goto start >> Autorestart.bat

goto donexd

:min12
del ProcessKiller.bat
del Autorestart.bat
del Runner.bat

echo :start >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 720000 >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo tskill java >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo start call runner >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo goto start >> ProcessKiller.bat

echo java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server >> Runner.bat
echo exit >> Runner.bat

echo @echo off >> Autorestart.bat
echo :start >> Autorestart.bat
echo Start call “Runner.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo call “ProcessKiller.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo pause >> Autorestart.bat
echo goto start >> Autorestart.bat
goto donexd

:min14
del ProcessKiller.bat
del Autorestart.bat
del Runner.bat

echo :start >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 840000 >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo tskill java >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo start call runner >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo goto start >> ProcessKiller.bat

echo java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server >> Runner.bat
echo exit >> Runner.bat

echo @echo off >> Autorestart.bat
echo :start >> Autorestart.bat
echo Start call “Runner.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo call “ProcessKiller.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo pause >> Autorestart.bat
echo goto start >> Autorestart.bat

goto donexd

:min16
del ProcessKiller.bat
del Autorestart.bat
del Runner.bat

echo :start >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 960000 >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo tskill java >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo start call runner >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo goto start >> ProcessKiller.bat

echo java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server >> Runner.bat
echo exit >> Runner.bat

echo @echo off >> Autorestart.bat
echo :start >> Autorestart.bat
echo Start call “Runner.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo call “ProcessKiller.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo pause >> Autorestart.bat
echo goto start >> Autorestart.bat
goto donexd

:min18
del ProcessKiller.bat
del Autorestart.bat
del Runner.bat

echo :start >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 1080000 >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo tskill java >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo start call runner >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo goto start >> ProcessKiller.bat

echo java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server >> Runner.bat
echo exit >> Runner.bat

echo @echo off >> Autorestart.bat
echo :start >> Autorestart.bat
echo Start call “Runner.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo call “ProcessKiller.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo pause >> Autorestart.bat
echo goto start >> Autorestart.bat
goto donexd

:min20
del ProcessKiller.bat
del Autorestart.bat
del Runner.bat

echo :start >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo PING 1.1.1.1 -n 1 -w 1200000 >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo tskill java >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo start call runner >> ProcessKiller.bat
echo goto start >> ProcessKiller.bat

echo java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server >> Runner.bat
echo exit >> Runner.bat

echo @echo off >> Autorestart.bat
echo :start >> Autorestart.bat
echo Start call “Runner.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo call “ProcessKiller.bat” >> Autorestart.bat
echo pause >> Autorestart.bat
echo goto start >> Autorestart.bat
goto donexd

:donexd
echo :: Autorestart configuration is complete. Choose ‘y’ at the menu.
pause
cls
goto aur
goto main

:crd
cls

echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
echo/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
echo/////
echo///// THANKS: I WANT TO GIVE THANKS TO ALL THE PEOPLE
echo///// ON MOPARSCAPE.ORG/SMF FOR THE HELP THEY GAVE ME
echo///// WHILE I WAS CREATING MY FIRST SERVER I HAD A VERY
echo///// HARD TIME. AND NO ONE REALLY HELPED ME TO MAKE THIS
echo///// I JUST STUDIED HOW OTHER PEOPLE MADE THEIRS AND I
echo///// MADE MINE.
echo///// AND A BIG HUGE THANKS TO GOD FOR WITHOUT HIM WE WOULD
echo///// NOT BE HERE TODAY.
echo///// GOT THE AUTO RESTARTER FROM Solumstone. THANKS
echo/////
echo//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
echo//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

pause
cls
goto main
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

i made my own server a long time ago then zipped it and put it on a cd.
now i uploaded it and and it ran perfectly until i deleted the old characters to make space.
then i tryed to compile it using my new java (1.6.0_11) and it wouldnt work then i tryed to run the server and it wouldnt work cuz it wasnt compiled.

then i try uploading the server again and had the same problem except i didnt delete anything on this one and tryed to run it and it wouldnt work.
what did i do.?

Read full topic
